ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from editing once the Expense record is approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (ISPICKVAL( Expense__r.Status__c , 'Approved') || ISPICKVAL( Expense__r.Status__c , 'Submitted')), NOT($Profile.Name == 'System Administrator') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Expense has been approved. Line items cannot be created or edited.
